title: Restaurante Km 0
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. In addition to all food being locally sourced, everything is also organic. Offers vegan, vegetarian and raw choices in a varied menu with most being gluten free. Open for breakfast, lunch and dinner with vegan choices for each meal.
streetAddress: Avda Del Mediterraneo, Ed Los Arqueros Beach, L8
